main: ^What do you seek in this empty lands?

c-1: ^And you shall find. Follow north until you see a blue flame. Don't stop to seek it until a ghostly woman's voice talk in your ears.
^With that, you maybe find the anwswers...
c-2: ^Don't need to fool me. You're clearlly not sick at all...
^Thy business in this lands are strange... I don't like you're presence in this place.
^I will ask kindly for you to leave.
c-3: ^I'm the first that came to this lands. And also, i will be the last.
^I am the beggining and i shall be the end.
^I am just a observer in this chaotic hell.
c-5: ^Seems like we don't have anything more to say...

already_know: ^We already talked about what was needed.
